name: Mr Fridge's Battlefield Bananza
description:
A student project for Studio 694, WCG's in-house game development studio. Developed by Gaby, Jack and Jake.

Mr Fridge’s Battlefield Bananza is a local co-op, bullet hell, twin stick shooter with crazy characters and colourful food filled environments.

A student made project, we wanted to make a fun new take on the bullet hell and twin stick genres.

With six zany characters and ten action packed food themed levels, we hope you enjoy Mr Fridge’s debut game!

This game is designed to be played by 2-players, using PC compatible controllers (recommend Xbox  wired pads).

Comments and feedback: @WCGamesArt

Studio 694 is a student-led game studio operated as part of WCG's Foundation Degree in Games Art course.
